title: Field Diary
brief_description: This film examines the Israeli occupation of the West Bank. Israeli filmmaker Amos Gitai interviews Israeli soldiers, Palestinians whose homes have been destroyed or taken from them, and new Israeli settlers.
description: This film examines the Israeli occupation of the West Bank. Israeli filmmaker Amos Gitai interviews Israeli soldiers, Palestinians whose homes have been destroyed or taken from them, and new Israeli settlers.
